name: stump
description: Stump is a self-hosted reading server for comics and ebooks. It supports libraries, reading progress, multiple users, and a polished web reader UI.
features: Comic library: Organizes digital comics and manga collections.
Ebook support: Reads EPUB and other ebook formats.
Web reader: Reads comics in browser with page-turning interface.
Reading progress: Tracks progress across devices with sync.
Library scanning: Automatically detects and indexes comic files.
Metadata management: Edits series, issue numbers, and descriptions.
User accounts: Creates separate accounts with individual reading lists.
Collections: Groups related comics into custom collections.
Search and filter: Finds comics by title, series, author, or tags.
Mobile apps: Native apps for iOS and Android reading.
OPDS support: Integrates with OPDS-compatible comic readers.
File formats: Supports CBZ, CBR, PDF, and other comic formats.
